Course Information.Course Title: Generative AI Model Development and Fine Tuning

Learning Outcomes: LO1: Implement generative models using deep learning algorithms and analyse their suitability for different problem requirements.
LO2: Preprocess and transform generative datasets using embeddings and tokenisation for model readiness.
LO3: Train generative AI models with neural optimisation techniques using benchmark datasets and performance metrics.
LO4: Identify model weaknesses through evaluation and propose targeted fine-tuning strategies for improvement.
Knowledge: K1: Probability theory and statistics (e.g., latent variables, probabilistic modelling)
K2: Common dataset formats and evaluation methodologies for generative tasks
K3: Fine-tuning techniques (e.g., supervised fine-tuning, parameter-efficient fine-tuning, perform inference)
K4: Optimisation techniques for training neural networks
K5: Parallel cluster training and inference
K6: Loss functions and evaluation metrics for generative tasks
K7: Data pre-processing, de-duplication and cleaning techniques (including understanding of training data requirements for AI models, common data quality issues)
K9: Deep learning theory and algorithms (e.g., GANs, VAEs, Transformers)
K10: Machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras)
Ability: A1: Implement generative models based on existing architectures
A2: Analyse problem statements and requirements to select and implement appropriate generative models
A3: Train generative models on benchmark datasets
A4: Identify limitations and propose initial improvements to models

A5: Preprocess and prepare data for generative training (e.g., clean and format datasets, use libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy) for data manipulation, split data into training, validation and test sets)

TSC and Topics.TSC Title: Generative AI Model Development and Fine Tuning
Topics: Topic 1: Fundamentals of Probability and Deep Learning (K1, K9, A1)
Topic 1: Data Processing and Evaluation (K2, K7, A5)
Topic 1: Neural Network Training (K4, K5, A3)
Learning Units: LU 4: Generative AI Model Fine Tuning
